resources.string:
Hi, my name is Jessica. 

Lord of the Rings type, the Chronicles of Narnia, in general stories where there is adventure and action. 
So I enjoy them in books, movies, series or anime. 

Simply because it transports me to a world where everything is possible. 
And I also enjoy music and I like to sing. 
The genres I consume the most are pop, rock, soundtracks and kpop. 

I can say that in general I am open in genres to see or hear but this predominates. 

Well, that's it.
